lenders.name: Eileen
lenders.loan_because: it's a small and simple way that can make a difference to someone's life, and that makes it so worthwhile.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a full-time mother to two beautiful boys, and i also work part-time from home and at the office, organising behind the scenes work for a helath care organisation's training and development programs. i also craft as a hobby and sell at markets. My life is cery very full.

lenders.name: Annikka
lenders.loan_because: These people need the money more than I do.

lenders.name: Adam
lenders.loan_because: It's fun, easy, and helps improve the world.

lenders.name: Danny
lenders.loan_because: I believe I can make the world a better place one transaction at a time.

lenders.name: Llewellyn
lenders.loan_because: I know what it means to receive help from others. Now it is my turn to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with the storage and movement of machinery parts for a company that builds manufacturing machines for other factories.

lenders.name: TIM
lenders.loan_because: I belive in peoples hopes and dreams
lenders.occupational_info: im just like you

lenders.name: Judy
lenders.loan_because:
I like the fact I 'know' who I'm helping and hopefully this will have a domino effect within their community and make a difference. 

I also like the fact that this isn't restricted by religion, or politics, just help as it was intended to be.
lenders.occupational_info: I advise people on how to get the best for their business from the Internet. I also design and build websites to help them do that.

lenders.name: alberto
lenders.loan_because: in 15 years in my job my earning is not enough for my family.i need a capital to open my own business. A simple business but its a big changes to our lives.I am a machinist so i want my future business would be a MACHINESHOP. I also love planting vegetables and gardening too.If God permitted me to loan a money i will open my own machineshop and small farm.
lenders.occupational_info: i work as a machinist for 15 years in a company. I operated a lathe, milling,drill,weilding,boring,vertical machine and banch work.I describe my work is so heavy and burden but because of my family it is my duty to work hard for them to live and have some foods in the table to share.

lenders.name: Mette
lenders.loan_because: I want to help someone stand up for themselves and make a living.

lenders.name: Knut Arild Nilsen
lenders.loan_because: helping these people starting their own business will also help their community to grow and be a better place to live.

lenders.name: Doris
lenders.loan_because: I like to help people.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a computer science student.

lenders.name: YBP
lenders.loan_because: we also help young entrepreneurs in The Netherlands and we also want to stimulate people with less income. These people also need an opportunity for a better living.
lenders.occupational_info: Coaching entrepreneurs and applying sustainability in our own region in small business.

lenders.name: Allison
lenders.loan_because: I want to help someone else in the world be successful
lenders.occupational_info: Supporting people with disabilities in their residential unit in everyday living recreational, vocational and promoting independance, choice and decision making

lenders.name: Monserrat
lenders.loan_because: I can easily spend $25.00 at a restaurant...this is more satisfying

lenders.name: Takeshi
lenders.loan_because: I believe one can change his/her life if given appropriate opportunities.
lenders.occupational_info: journalist working with a Japanese-language national daily, specializing development issues.

lenders.name: Peter
lenders.loan_because: Give a man a fish, you feed him for a day.  Teach a man to fish, you feed him for life......Well, this is more like giving a man a fishing pole, but It's all good :)

lenders.name: Christopher
lenders.loan_because: The best path to true enjoyment of the many blessings in my life is to share them..
lenders.occupational_info:
I'm a disc jockey at a radio station.
I also write, produce and voice comedy and commercials for radio, and write network news copy.

lenders.name: Rhoda
lenders.loan_because:
This is the true joy in life, the being used for a purpose recognized by yourself as a mighty one; the being a force of nature instead of a feverish, selfish little clod of ailments and grievances complaining that the world will not devote itself to making you happy.
I am of the opinion that my life belongs to the whole community, and as long as I live it is my privilege to do for it whatever I can. I want to be thoroughly used up when I die, for the harder I work the more I live. I rejoice in life for its own sake. Life is no "brief candle" for me. It is a sort of splendid torch which I have got hold of for the moment, and I want to make it burn as brightly as possible before handing it on to future generations -George Bernard Shaw
lenders.occupational_info: I make digital experiences

lenders.name: Huu
lenders.loan_because: why not?
lenders.occupational_info: I clean up land that has been contaminated by chemicals that can harm people's health

lenders.name: Debra

lenders.name: Rachel
lenders.loan_because: I feel good knowing that I can help someone, even with a small amount

lenders.name: Jaime
lenders.loan_because: every little bit helps and I would probably buy something frivolous with the money I can use to help someone else better their life with.
lenders.occupational_info: I educate children, giving them a variety of skills they will use in the future for their careers, raising their children and on a daily basis.

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: I have had a good life and this is a way of passing on the good fortune.
lenders.occupational_info: I travel all over the US and get to see a lot of beautiful places. It is very stressful during the winter when I have to drive through snow storms.

lenders.name: Kathy

lenders.name: Yashesh
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.loan_because: "Give a man a fish; you have fed him for today. Teach a man to fish; and you have fed him for a lifetime"

lenders.name: Jon & Janice

lenders.occupational_info: We are business owners just like you.

lenders.name: www.LIVEINPEACE.ws

lenders.name: Stefan
lenders.loan_because: The support of friends and family has allowed me to take risks in life.  It has given me the resources to try new things, and helped to soften the blow when my attempts met with failure.  Now that many of my risks have succeeded, I want to share this support with others.
lenders.occupational_info: I study the way brains work and the way people think, particularly how we form expectations and how our expectations change what we perceive and what we learn.

lenders.name: Elise
lenders.loan_because: Give a Man a fish....
lenders.occupational_info: I figure out how much of something we are going to sell in a year and have that amount purchased.

lenders.loan_because: I believe that the best way to make a difference for social justice and poverty alleviation is by getting money and opportunity into the hands of people at the grassroots level.

lenders.name: Webber Academy Gr 12

lenders.name: Alicia

lenders.loan_because: It feels good :)

lenders.name: Lester
lenders.loan_because:
“If anyone has material possessions and sees his brother in need but has no pity on him, how can the love of God be in him?”
-1 John 3:17

The parable of those who spend
of their substance in the way of Allah
is that of a grain of corn:
It grows seven ears, and each ear has a hundred grains.
Allah gives manifold increase to whom He pleases;
And Allah cares for all and He knows all things.
Qur'an (2:261)

Mishneh Torah, Hilkhot matanot aniyim :
Giving an interest-free loan to a person in need; forming a partnership with a person in need; giving a grant to a person in need; finding a job for a person in need; so long as that loan, grant, partnership, or job results in the person no longer living by relying upon others
lenders.occupational_info: Train and configure software for small physician practices.

lenders.name: Jessica

lenders.loan_because: We are a women owned international small business and want to see other women experience success !!!!!!!!!

lenders.name: Jennifer

Mother Theresa

lenders.loan_because: I like to see people succeed.

lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: robert

lenders.name: Toshiko
lenders.loan_because: I think it's a good way. And I wanna help someone who has good dreams.

lenders.name: Roger
lenders.loan_because:
Nothing is predestined: The obstacles of your past can become the gateways that lead to new beginnings.  --Ralph Blum      
Kiva is a "gateway" for us to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage projects to clean up environmental damage cause by human activity.  I hope to leave the earth a cleaner place than I found it.  I also hope that organizations like Kiva continue to prosper and share the message that we should all try to help our neighbors around the world to make the world a better place for future generations.

lenders.name: Brooke
lenders.loan_because: I was a Peace Corps Volunteer in Paraguay, and I know the benefits first hand of lending to small entrepreneurs, to better the lives of their families and communities. In particular, women borrowers have a great impact on both, and have an excellent track record of paying off their debt. I believe that some of the most effective development is that carried out by small entrepreneurs, rather than large aid organizations like the World Bank and USAID.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a high school and provide personal, academic and career counseling to adolescents. I also work closely with their parents, teachers and administrators, to help our students be successful and ready for education/training beyond high school.

lenders.name: beth
lenders.loan_because: Even the smallest person can change the course of the future.
lenders.occupational_info: I create clothing, bags and home decor from recycled and vintage fabric and trim in my little house

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: We make chopper bicycles in my country, the philippines. Its  still non-existent here so i want to start the craze.
lenders.occupational_info: I basically have to market everything, including what a chopper is, is it ridable, safe, and not just decoration.  I'm Mr. Chopper here!

lenders.name: Faith
lenders.loan_because: I used to live in Cambodia and saw how difficult it was for people to raise funds to start a business.

lenders.name: Tony
lenders.loan_because: People who want to help themselves, help this world become a better place.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage computer networks for a small brewery in the midwest US.

lenders.name: Danny

lenders.loan_because: Even though I am only 15 months old, I believe that it important to be grateful for what we have been given and to help those around us that may be in need.
lenders.occupational_info: I am just a baby who wants to grow up to make a difference in this world.

lenders.occupational_info: I am a 3 year old kid who just wants to help others.

lenders.loan_because: I want to help entrepreneurs grow their businesses, create jobs, and have a better life with their families.

lenders.name: Charlotte
lenders.loan_because: ........why not?

lenders.name: Bry
lenders.loan_because: There are others in the world that are less fortunate than I am. These individuals deserve the chance at a better life for themselves and their families. I'm glad I can help them.
lenders.occupational_info: Everyday I wake up and get ready for a new day at my high school. I am involved in student government, athletics and the school band and also in my community.

lenders.name: Aaron
lenders.loan_because: Small actions make big changes.
lenders.occupational_info: I press buttons in the right order.

my initial investment of

lenders.loan_because: I like to help people who work to improve the lives of themselves and their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I design airplanes.

lenders.name: Steve & Candi
lenders.loan_because: I've lived among the impoverished people of Brazil, and I want to help people who have the desire and work ethic to support their families.  We can help...so we should!
lenders.occupational_info: I make plans for the smart growth of cities, and Candi raises our beautiful children.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: Although the first part of my life was a financial struggle, I now find myself in the fortunate position of being able to help others. This is something I have always wanted to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an investor and a part-time adult education teacher in the field of management.

lenders.name: Sassy Pants
lenders.loan_because: It makes my tail wag and my whiskers twitch.
lenders.occupational_info: Laying on the couch, eating kibble, running in the yard, and playing with my animal friends, Jack , Zoe and Rossi.

lenders.name: Takuya Inoue
lenders.loan_because:
Simply I like helping people.

No one on the earth can live without supporting each other.

The concept of KIVA really fascinated me when I was reading an article about KIVA on a newspaper. I have to thank the Kiva founder  from the bottom of my heart for providing us with the opportunity to help people on the opposite side of the world effectively.

'' A life lived for others is worth living''
lenders.occupational_info: I'm studying Accounting at Brigham Young University- Idaho.

lenders.name: Carlos
lenders.loan_because: I want to help making the world a better place through practical initiatives, contributing at my individual scale with a small amount which will combine with many more to create a big difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people understand math, and pass their math exams so they can make progress in their career.

lenders.name: Sharon
lenders.loan_because: I like to share what I can to make other peoples lives easier!
lenders.occupational_info: I sell vintage clothing and make art from my little home in the woods:)

lenders.name: Mitsuru
lenders.loan_because: to find out what I am

lenders.name: Kay
lenders.loan_because: My friend Alex heard about Kiva on Oprah. And I was fortunate enough to see the power of microloans in action in Vietnam.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because:
'...there, but for the grace of God, 
go I...'

lenders.name: janbelle
lenders.loan_because: i want to expand and sell more food prouducts .please help us
lenders.occupational_info: we wake very early in the morning to make breakfast for those going to work and closed the store after wards because we are short in money to continue cook the whole day

lenders.name: Maria Cristina
lenders.loan_because: I like helping people help themselves!

lenders.name: Allison
lenders.loan_because: By making micro-loans to female entreprenuers in developing areas, the LEAP Foundation hopes to join many other charity based organizations that grant micro-loans to deserving borrowers worldwide. By helping them grow and expand their own endeavors, LEAP can empower women to take control of their own futures by enabling them to continually focus on the growth necesasary to sustain long term productivity. We hope to become a key element to helping these women create and sustain wealth for themselves, their families, and their communities by helping them with capital to which they otherwise would have no access.

lenders.name: gilbert
lenders.loan_because: to have a small general merchandise store and to help my family in our financial and daily needs and i want also to go back  to school to finish my college level as a hotel and restaurant management course and to give my family a better future,by building our future dream house and have a happy family
lenders.occupational_info: i am a sales demo in a department store assigned in shoes department i sell to customer a ladies shoes where i am working now.

lenders.name: Ai Lin
lenders.loan_because: I would like to help everyone, especially fellow Asians, get a chance to improve their lives and retain their dignity.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach young people just before they enter university.

lenders.name: Toni
lenders.loan_because: This program appears to be  a win win situation for everyone involved.  If my small donations can make a difference in someone's life than I am happy about that.  And the fact that the donations are repaid is really a unique set-up.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a homemaker and a devoted grandmother to 6 children (soon to be seven) ranging in age from 13 1/2 to 2 1/2 years.  They are the light of my life.  I have been happily married for 40 years and my family is the most important thing in my life.  This love of family comes through in the stories of  the people receiving the loans and it is a wonderful thing to be able to help in this small way.

lenders.name: Susana
lenders.loan_because: helping encourage the economy in developing countries to flourish enables them to ultimately  be self sufficient
lenders.occupational_info: I fly internationally for a major U.S. air carrier

lenders.name: Amy
lenders.loan_because: I believe this is the best way to help those in need. Sure, giving money is a generous gesture, but providing the tools for independence is the gift that keeps on giving.

lenders.name: Kristine
lenders.loan_because: I live in a rich country and enjoy more freedom than most women on the planet. I want to make the world a better place by contributing any way I can.

lenders.name: Ana
lenders.loan_because: I really admire and respect these people who keep fighting for a better life for themselves when their odds are not great. I hope to learn something from them.

lenders.name: Eleanor
lenders.loan_because: I have often thought it would be difficult for me to make to make a difference in someone's life.   Kiva has given me this opportunity, and I hope this will be the start of a long partnership, between myself, Kiva, and someone who wants to improve thier life.  Kiva, thank you for the bridge.

lenders.name: Benjamin Shobert
lenders.loan_because: The world changes when individuals connect with an idea bigger than themselves, and the opportunity to blend the good of globalization by lending to those who are too easily overlooked or overwhelmed by the very same processes is one such "big" idea.
lenders.occupational_info: I own & manage two businesses:  one a consulting business helping Chinese businesses come to America (and vice versa) and another that sells an over the counter (OTC) medical good.
